Method Detail

setColumns

public void setColumns(java.util.List<java.lang.String> columns,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> synonymRefs)
This method attaches known tags to the columns (or ignore) as specified in columns element in taxonOptions.xml. Besides tags, this method provides a way to specify the source of synonyms (e.g., from another known database). This allows column configuration without guessing from labels appearing in column headers

Parameters:
columns -
synonymRefs -

list of items parsed from the spreadsheet file
